== Getting Involved ==
<<BR>>
Ubuntu GNOME is a community project. All our members work on a volunteer basis, simply because we love it! If you have that passion, you're in the right place. '''Ubuntu GNOME needs you'''. With your help, we can be even better.

Here are some resources to get you started:
